obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_79_: \E0* Don't be blue.&* We're here for you.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_81_: \E0* Welcome to Color&Cafe.&* Let us warm your day.
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_415: \E0* Please come again.&* We'll be waiting for you&with rose-tinted glasses.../%
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_421: * Ah^1, forgive me for not introducing myself sooner^1, young masters./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_422: * I am Swatch^1, Our Lady Grace's head butler./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_423: * When we are not attending to her needs^1, I and the Queen's other staff^1,/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_424: * Use this room as our humble yet colorful gift-shop-slash-cafe./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_425: * Please^1, shop to your heart's content. We are eager to serve your any wish./%
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_431: * Does a woman of Our Lady Grace's caliber not deserve -/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_432: * A coven of powerful men and women to dote upon her every movement?/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_433: * To have rap anthems written to her kindness --/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_434: * Which are then bitcrushed beyond recognition to make them more 'computer'?/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_435: * To have melons^1, smashed^1, with karate chops^1, repeatedly^1, for no apparent reason?/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_436: * To have barrels^1, thrown^1, from the rafters --/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_437: * And make us smash them all with karate chops before the timer runs out?/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_438: * But the barrels^1, are full of melons^1, and we have to smash those too?/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_447: * Rouxls? I am afraid I am not familiar with a guest of that moniker.../
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_448: * Ah^1, wait. Are you perchance referring to that unbearable -/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_449: * Err^1, UNIQUE Man who barged in here and demanded to be made "Butler Supremeth?"/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_450: * I am afraid that person..^1. is now banned from this establishment./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_451: * And may have suffered injuries as a result of his^1, err..^1. rather swift ejection./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_452: * Please do not mention him again./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_453: * We are still cleaning up the worms he left on the floor./%
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_457: * Oh^1, you defeated that simpleton? Wonderful^1, wonderful./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_458: * After he stole our flower display for one of his "boo-kettes^1,"/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_459: * Tasque Manager told me she saw him in the hallway^1,/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_460: * Where^1, opening with "Ah^1, thou muste be 50`% Likelye to be Queene"^1,/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_461: * He thrust the vase upon her^1, and asked to be her "minion for life."/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_462: * ..^1. he was promptly electrocuted to the ground./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_463: * Well. Enough of the unpleasantries. Would you like a toasted marshmallow?/%
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_480: * What? Basement? There's no basement here./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_481: * You need to relax. Have a drink^1, and talk softly.../
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_489: * That robot was the embodiment of a Lightner's dream./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_490: * A dream I helped create..^1. once./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_491: * Splashing color from the motion of their hand./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_492: * The Lightner filled it with their own hope^1, giving it an incredible power./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_493: * ..^1. but^1, in the end^1, nothing ever came of it./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_494: * And it was left in the basement with the rest of the corrupted data./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_495: * ..^1. But that crooked salesman^1! Somehow^1, he learned about the robot^1,/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_496: * And thought he could use its power to fulfill his own twisted dreams./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_497: * What a pity. To think he was once a valued customer.../%
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_472: * Ah^1, my outfit. Yes^1, the monochrome look is quite suitable^1, isn't it?/
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_473: * Black suit^1, colored glasses. Many people have failed to imitate this look./
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_474: * Some even going so far as to attempt to impersonate me.../
obj_shop_ch2_swatch_slash_Draw_0_gml_475: * In order to get the..^1. Oh^1, nevermind. Macaron?/%
